./VulnDB/RDBO/UserProfile.pm

  • package VulnDB::RDBO::UserProfile
  • EOF
   1 package VulnDB::RDBO::UserProfile;
   2 
   3 use strict;
   4 
   5 use base qw(VulnDB::RDBO);
   6 
   7 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
   8     table   => 'user_profile',
   9 
  10     columns => [
  11         id                 => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  12         user_id            => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  13         where_heard        => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 250, not_null => 1 },
  14         criteria_pref_type => { type => 'varchar', default => 'simple', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
  15     ],
  16 
  17     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
  18 
  19     unique_key => [ 'user_id' ],
  20 
  21     foreign_keys => [
  22         user => {
  23             class       => 'VulnDB::RDBO::AuthUser',
  24             key_columns => { user_id => 'id' },
  25             rel_type    => 'one to one',
  26         },
  27     ],
  28 
  29     relationships => [
  30         alertmethods => {
  31             column_map    => { userprofile_id => 'id' },
  32             foreign_class => 'VulnDB::RDBO::AlertMethod',
  33             map_class     => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserAlertMethod',
  34             map_from      => 'userprofile',
  35             map_to        => 'alertmethod',
  36             type          => 'many to many',
  37         },
  38 
  39         messages => {
  40             column_map    => { userprofile_id => 'id' },
  41             foreign_class => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Message',
  42             map_class     => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserMessage',
  43             map_from      => 'userprofile',
  44             map_to        => 'message',
  45             type          => 'many to many',
  46         },
  47 
  48         sources => {
  49             column_map    => { userprofile_id => 'id' },
  50             foreign_class => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Source',
  51             map_class     => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserSource',
  52             map_from      => 'userprofile',
  53             map_to        => 'source',
  54             type          => 'many to many',
  55         },
  56     ],
  57 );
  58 
  59 1;
